profile:
1-800-Rid-Of-It is Toronto's premier junk removal service. We are a locally-owned company providing quality service to homeowners and commercial clients in Toronto and the surrounding areas since 2007. We specialize in the removal of junk from homes, construction sites, garages, warehouses, office towers, and apartment buildings- basically, anywhere you have JUNK. 

We also offer same day junk pickup and make sure no damage is caused to your property during this process. With our online price estimator, you can find the best rates for junk removal and bin disposal in Toronto.

profile:
Junk, clutter or unwanted materials taking up space? Let us do the dirty work for you or you can rent a bin and do the work yourself.

***

Junk Kings junk removal services are offered to residential and commercial customers. We provide all-inclusive services to our clients from loading to transport to disposal of your junk. 

***

Our trucks have 20 cubic yard boxes, which is equivalent to 10 pick-up truck loads. The trucks are operated by a strong, professional and courteous staff that will evaluate the work and quote a price based on weight, volume and time. Upon agreement, the crew will load, haul and dispose of your rubbish at your earliest convenience.

Give us a call today!

Random Junk We Have Removed

Over the years Junk King has removed some very odd and random junk. This is a list of some of the items we have removed.

-Twenty-five boxes of 1940-1960 Life Magazines
-Old rotted camping trailer cut into pieces
-One full truck of expired potato chips
-Five broken slushy machines
-World War 2 Memorabilia
-Four truck loads worth of paper and cardboard from a 1 bedroom apartment
-Twelve sofas from one basement
-Crisp new $1 bills from the 1960â€™s hidden in an old coat pocket
-Two truck loads full of mannequin heads

profile:
At ACG INC we build homes, not houses! 

Our experts have been providing quality general contractor services to our valuable customers since 2017. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and we offer competitive prices with exceptional quality. Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship. We are transparent with your project from start to finish, ensuring that the final product meets your expectations. We will also happily assist you with obtaining permits, choosing design and  architecture. 

Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation, so you can reach out to ACG INC. with upmost confidence.
products: For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing on your project.
services: Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions, hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations.

profile:
At ACG INC we build homes, not houses! 

Our experts have been providing quality general contractor services to our valuable customers since 2017. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and we offer competitive prices with exceptional quality. Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship. We are transparent with your project from start to finish, ensuring that the final product meets your expectations. We will also happily assist you with obtaining permits, choosing design and  architecture. 

Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation, so you can reach out to ACG INC. with upmost confidence.

profile:
WE REMOVE EVERYHTING FROM ANYWHERE AT ANY TIME!

junk Solutions is a full service junk removal company and with one phone call or on-line booking, our INSURED and UNIFORMED team members will come to your RESIDENCE or BUSINESS at a convenient time for you and provide an upfront, all inclusive quote with optional same day, next day service. 

We will RECYCLE, dispose or DONATE all of your junk or CLEAN UP afterwards. 

Junk solutions offer FREE ESTIMATES and GUARANTEES the LOWEST RATES in the GTA for junk removal services and will not only match any other quote by another junk removal company but also DEDUCT and additional 15%. 

We also accept ALL COUPONS from any other junk removal company. 

No Job is too big or too small
services:
WE REMOVE ANYTHING FROM ANYWHERE AT ANYTIME!

What we remove:

JUNK REMOVAL:
-furniture,appliancesâ€™ mattresses, box springs,televisions, e -waste, household garbage, exercise equipment(treadmill), patio furniture, basketball nets, sofa beds cardboard,palllets,office furniture,cubicles, wall units, tires, household clutter  etc.

POST CONSTRUCTION DEBRIS
drywall,sinks, insulation, shingles,wood, cabinets , counter tops, toilets, sinks, framing, baseboards and much more

FLOORING
Junk Solutions will arrive at your residence or business and will create a dust fee environment before the removal of your floors
Flooring installers will over charge to remove your existing floors because they are only interested in the installation process....
Junk Solutions will not only remove your flooring but also any staples, metal mesh, nails, treads, dust, glue and anything else that is underneath your flooring after it has been removed
Junk Solutions will remove your existing flooring and do a complete preparation for your contracted to install the floors, and we will not only match any other quote you have received from a retailer or installer to remove your existing floors but we also deduct additional 15% off.....
Junk Solutions specialize in flooring removal at lower cost then anyone else.

TYPES OF FLOORING WE REMOVE
Carpet, tile, laminate, vinyl, cork, hardwood, ceramic, engineered wood, marble, travertine ,porcelain stone ware , terrazzo etc
EXTERIOR OF HOME
sheds, decks , fences , trees , shrubs, weeds, soil, gravel, stones, concrete, yard waste, sod, above ground pools, garages and much more
SCRAP METAL
Any scrap metal that is brought outside your residence or business and is located in our services area will be picked up free of cost ...
specialities:
Hot Tub Removal and Piano Removal

Junk Solutions has removed over 1000 hot tubs and 500 pianos in the G.T.A area and make removing these items a priority over any other junk removal jobs....
Our experience and understanding allows us to remove these items in the most safe and efficient way possible ...
Junk solutions 100% guarantees the lowest price to remove any hot tub or piano....and will not only match but deduct a additional 15% off any quote you received any other Junk removal company

profile:
We would like to introduce you to our Green Junk Fellas team! 


Green Junk Fellas is a locally owned junk removal and recycling company serving residential customers and businesses throughout the immediate Toronto and GTA area. Whether youâ€™re in the city, or anywhere in the suburbs we are always ready to help you get rid of your unwanted item. No job is too big or too small for our team. Our experienced professionals understand the needs of our varied clientele, including real estate developers, retail stores, property managers and contractors.  We  always adapt our services to best suit your needs.



Green Junk  Fellas  understands their costumers more than anyone else. That is why we offer larger trucks, lower prices, free on site estimates and friendly service.
We are not just another junk removal company. We are segregators. We sort everything on site and then
recycle, reuse and donate most of the unwanted items. Electronics, metals, cardboard, plastics, tires etc., will not end up in landfills if taken by us. We will also help your old furniture, toys, clothing and other reusable items find new homes wherever possible. 

          We are locally owned, fully insured and licensed.

profile:
Junk Works Mississauga

Starting in 2005, our company's founders, Mike Andreacchi and Brian Reardon, knew there were customers looking for dependable junk hauling service to clear clutter and unwanted items from homes and businesses. The two long-time friends founded Junk Kingâ„¢ and established a business in their garage. Since then the company has grown rapidly, but the superior service and attention to detail that made them stand out has remained the same. Now we are bringing the exceptional service and green junk removal to Canada with Junk Works.

We continue to do things the old-fashioned way, one customer at a time. We offer fair, up-front pricing, call you 15 - 30 minutes ahead of every job, and sweep up after ourselves.

Furniture Removal
Television Disposal & Recycling
Yard Waste Removal
Foreclosure Clean Outs
Appliance Removal
Hot Tub Disposal

profile:
Affordable junk removal services.
We remove furniture such as; sofas, chairs, tables, mattresses etc...
We also remove wood, drywall, tiles, garbage bags, cardboard and we also offer small demolition services such as; shed and hot tub removal. Same day services is sometimes available depending on schedule. Rates based on 12 feet long by 8 feet wide by 5 feet high. 1/8 of a load is $120, a 1/4 load is $180, a 1/2 load is $280, a 3/4 load is $370 and a full load of household junk is $400. Rates always include labour to load, transportation costs and disposal fees are included. Rates for light renovation: 1/8 load is  $140, a 1/4 load is $240, 1/2 load is $340, a 3/4 load is $440 and a full load is $500. Extra charges apply for the removal of concrete, rocks, dirt, sand or large volumes on broken tile. We recycle cardboard, electronic waste and metal. We also donate good quality clothing and furniture. With over 15 years experience, you can count on us to provide you with affordable junk removal in the GTA. Call Daniel at : 1877 586 5369
